page.title: 17SPORTS CENTRE BISHOPBRIGGS
page.content: {Bishopbriggs Sports Centre}is a modern purpose built complex in the North-Western part of the community. It offers a wide range of indoor facilities from Archery and Aerobics to Wrestling and Weight-Training. There is a large{Games Hall}which is capable of sub-division; a competition standard{Swimming Pool}as well as a small{Training Pool}for beginners; 2{ {Squash Courts,}a{Multi-Gym,}and a small{Practice Gym;}outdoor facilities include an all weather{Tennis Court} and an outdoor{5-a-side football {pitch.} Within the main building are spacious changing facilities and locker rooms,a cafe, a bar, viewing facilities from a gallery, and a creche as well as first aid facilities.
